Title: Blue Dwarf Needs Food Badly
Description:
Oi!

We need ta' get us some food, if we're gonna survive here for long!

Ye' may not know it, but I'm somethin' of a cook me'self. Why don'tcha go out there and fetch us some meaty bits. I can cook 'em up and feed us for weeks! Or, days, at least.
RewardText: Good work! I'm telliin' ye, these Kun-Lai meaty bits are grade A goodness!
